isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - PRO SLEEPER ELECTRICAL SYSTEM - LIGHTING, ACCESSORIES AND TRAILER SOCKET - SLEEPER AUXILIARY POWER SOURCE

svcproc.title: SLEEPER AUXILIARY POWER SOURCE
svcproc.para:
Refer to circuit diagram on
for the following discussion.

The right and left auxiliary power sources receive power at all times from B2 battery stud, through cab fuse F-10-C and sleeper fuses 583-A and 583-B. The power source ground path is through the sleeper and cab harness to cab ground adapter (454).
